Package bayes.builders

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HillClimbingBuilder
    Implements a standard hill climbing search through the Bayes Nets structures in order to optimize a scoring function.
    NaiveBayesBuilder
    Builds a Bayesian Network with a Naive Bayes Structure
    NetworkBuilder
    Constructs a BayesianNetwork object
    Operation
    Represents a single operation that can be performed on the network's structure.
    SparseCandidateBuilder  
    SparseCandidateBuilder.KlEdgeScorePair
    A directed edge in the network paired with the KL-Divergence of the two attributes' joint probability between the training distribution and the current net distribution
    TANBuilder  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HillClimbingBuilder.StoppingCriteria  
    Operation.Type
    Types of operations
